detectors.description:
Reentrancy in ERC900BasicStakeContract.createStake(address,uint256,uint256,bytes) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicStakingContract.sol#361-390):
	External calls:
	- canStake(msg.sender,_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicStakingContract.sol#368)
		- require(bool,string)(stakingToken.transferFrom(_address,this,_amount),Stake required) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicStakingContract.sol#188-190)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stakeHolders[msg.sender].exists = true (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicStakingContract.sol#374)
	- stakeHolders[_address].totalStakedFor = stakeHolders[_address].totalStakedFor.add(_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicStakingContract.sol#377)
	- stakeHolders[msg.sender].personalStakes.push(Stake(block.timestamp.add(_lockInDuration),_amount,_address)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicStakingContract.sol#378-383)
